name: Rilakkuma Touch!
description:
Thanks to you, Rilakkuma Touch! has surpassed 1,500,000 downloads!

You can now buy Rilakkuma Touch! + (Plus) through In-App Purchase within Rilakkuma Touch! (Free).

As before, you can pat Rilakkuma on the head, tickle his feet, and interact with him, while enjoying his adorable expressions and behavior in Rilakkuma Touch! (Free). Many snacks and items are available in the paid version Rilakkuma Touch! + (Plus), allowing for even greater interaction with Rilakkuma. Have fun with Rilakkuma Touch! + (Plus), loaded with an additional wide variety of reactions.

In response to fan requests, we have added Korilakkuma and Kiiroitori! You can have fun with their uniquely cute behavior!

Rilakkuma Touch! + (Plus) can be bought within the Rilakkuma Touch! (Free) app.


*** Language
Japanese/English/Chinese

***Compatible Device
Compatible with iPhone 4/4S, iPhone 5/5s/5c iPhone6/6 Plus iPad and iPod touch 4th generation and up.

Note: Due to system memory issues, this application cannot operate properly on earlier models than those stated above.

***Restriction on Use
The reproduction of the illustrations and images used in this application, without consent, is strictly prohibited.
